column1: Use Case 1: Skill Gap Analysis (Resume Parsing & Feedback)

column5: Upload and validate user resume files

column4: Optional target job role for context

400: Invalid file format, file too large

column5: Extract skills and experience using BERT-based Named Entity Recognition (NER)

NLP Model (BERT-based Named Entity Recognition (NER)), Resume Storage, NER Engine

column5: Analyze skill gaps using SemanticSkillMatcher and provide actionable feedback

column4: Array of user's current skills extracted from resume
Array of required skills for target job role
Target job role name (optional, for context)
